DefaultReaderConfiguration.description: Microsoft ISA Firewall (W3C Extended file format)

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

select.toolTipText: New log file generation format (daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly)
Configured Time Zone for log files (local or GMT)

boolean.toolTipText: Enable to account for Daylight Savings Time when appropriate

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastToolId.description: Microsoft ISA Firewall (W3C Extended file format)

FastField.defaultValue: sessionid="$26" cs-username="$2" c-agent="$3" r-host="$10" cs-protocol="$16" sc-status="$22" rule#1="$24" rule#2="$25" connectionid="$27"
